2.5D Sprite Converter

Light weight sprite converter for UnityEditor.
Create 2.5D style sprite sheet from given GameObject or Prefab.

Get here: http://u3d.as/GTd (still pending review 2017-1-12)

Works well on all the version of Unity 5.X.

How To Use:
1, Select your model.
2, Click "Create" button.

○ Easy To Use: Create sprites by only one click.
○ Well Organized: Sprites from same model have the same size, and the pivot always fit the 3D pivot of the model.

○ Powerful: You can ajust the edge color, light intensity, view angles, etc...
